mapper.insert: insert into Student (student_id, area, group_num, class_num, name, state, face_id) values( #{student_id}, #{area}, #{group_num}, #{class_num}, #{name}, #{state}, #{face_id} )
mapper.update: update Student set area=#{area}, group_num=#{group_num}, class_num=#{class_num}, name=#{name}, state=#{state}, face_id=#{face_id} where student_id= #{student_id}
mapper.select: select student_id, area, group_num, class_num, name, state, face_id from Student where student_id = #{student_id}
